Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 4 for SLE 15 SP4)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 4 for SLE 15 SP4)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 5.14.21-150400_24_28 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2021-39698: Fixed a possible memory corruption due to a use after free in aio_poll_complete_work. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. (bsc#1196956)
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Live Patching 15 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: In aio_poll_complete_work of aio.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-185125206References: Upstream kernel
